projects.title: Electric Vehicles Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
Electric Vehicle Data Analysis: Insights into the Future of Mobility! ⚡🚗


I am excited to share my latest data visualization project on Electric Vehicle (EV) trends!


📊🔍 This dashboard provides a deep dive into:


✅ Total EVs on the road


✅ Market share by brand & model


✅ Yearly trends in EV adoption


✅ State-wise distribution of EVs


✅ CAFV eligibility insights


As the EV industry accelerates, data-driven insights like these help us understand the shift towards sustainable transportation. ♻️💡

projects.title: Thomas J. Watson Fan Page
projects.bodyText:
📄 Built a static HTML page dedicated to Thomas J. Watson, Sr., the founder of IBM.


I am excited to Showcased historical achievements with a brief biography, major milestones, and IBM's growth during his leadership.


📊 Included a styled HTML table displaying IBM's employee and income growth from 1925 to 1935.


Integrated an interactive form where users can submit feedback or insights, using:


✅ Input fields for name and email


✅ A textarea for comments


✅ Required field validation for better user experience


🔗Linked to external resources, including the official IBM website.


🎨 Used semantic HTML elements.


🚀 Foundation for future enhancement,such as connecting the form to a backend or database for storing submissions.

projects.title: Sales of the Global Super Store Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
This project analyzes the Sales of the Global Super Store (2021-2024) 📈 — highlighting trends across different segments and tracking year-over-year growth 📊.


🔹 Consumer segment leads the sales!


🔹 Steady growth seen across all sectors post-2022.


🔹 Seasonal patterns captured month-over-month 📅.
